title: How to Draw Yonang from Latale

steps.headline: Draw a circle, curving the top of it.
steps.description: The curve is where YoNang's bun goes.

steps.headline: Add another curve on top of the other one, in the opposite direction.
Draw two lines at the sides of the head, and add two more in the lines.
Color in the bun by filling it in with your pencil in a circular motion.
It's never too early to start working on the face.
steps.description: You can start by making the bindi (Bindi is shown in the picture)

steps.headline: Draw the bonnet and the inside of it.
Draw eyes, a nose and a mouth.
Draw the circles on her bonnet, the flowers on her head, a strand of hair from the bun, and then the two sticks (Are those chopsticks?)
Fill the side hair in (NOT THE LINES IN IT) and add her upper body.
Fill the hair that's on her upper body, then you can add her middle part of her body.
steps.description: Don't forget to add her arms holding her bonnet! While you're at it, add the outline for her skirt.

steps.headline: Next, add the things on her bonnet, the end of her hair (Goes on the skirt) and some creases on the skirt.

text: Draw a circle, curving the top of it. The curve is where YoNang's bun goes. Add another curve on top of the other one, in the opposite direction.  Draw two lines at the sides of the head, and add two more in the lines.  Color in the bun by filling it in with your pencil in a circular motion.  It's never too early to start working on the face. You can start by making the bindi (Bindi is shown in the picture) Draw the bonnet and the inside of it.  Draw eyes, a nose and a mouth.  Draw the circles on her bonnet, the flowers on her head, a strand of hair from the bun, and then the two sticks (Are those chopsticks?) on the flowers. Fill the side hair in (NOT THE LINES IN IT) and add her upper body.  Fill the hair that's on her upper body, then you can add her middle part of her body. Don't forget to add her arms holding her bonnet! While you're at it, add the outline for her skirt. Next, add the things on her bonnet, the end of her hair (Goes on the skirt) and some creases on the skirt.  Color it in!  Finished.
